data.name: Gorilla Diamond
data.description:
Gorilla Diamond Inc. is a Canadian Crypto corporation based out of Ottawa, Ontario, which launched the
Gorilla Diamond Token (GDT) – a Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20) token – on April 10, 2021. Despite the
company’s youth, the veteran leadership at the top level is evident. Gorilla Diamond Inc. is fully licensed
to operate under the provincial and federal scope in Canada - it abides by all the provincial and federal
legislation and regulations that exist. Accordingly, the company is extremely transparent in all of its
activities; from posting a copy of their Article of Incorporation and official GOV. Certificate on their
website, to posting all of the transactions that go through their wallets, to providing its shareholders
with insight into their future plans and the opportunity to contribute. They will soon begin the process
of registering with FINTRAC. Gorilla Diamond token has recently been listed by Coin Gecko and can be found
at this link: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/gorilla-diamond

So what makes $GDT one of a kind in the crypto world? Well, apart from the fact that their BNB presale
sold out in less than 10 minutes, with a growing popularity; they plan on creating and implementing a
continuous profit-sharing model. Their profit-sharing model will be implemented throughout the life-
time of the company with various projects that they plan to launch. Profit sharing is only for investors who hold
$GDT tokens. In efforts to launch this project, Gorilla Diamond Inc. is creating a platform called the Diamond
Service Market (DSM), which will revolutionize the peer-to-peer service exchange category.

Gorilla Diamond Inc. will disrupt the business model of crypto Corporations by leading the way with
profit-sharing to all their token holders - from company developments to various initiatives within
divisions of the corporation. Gorilla Diamond’s CEO, Ahmad Hassan, believes in bridging the gap
between dividend-making stocks in the outside world and profit-sharing token models in the crypto
world – to bring them to one reality.

Gorilla Diamond Inc. launched their deflationary token with a reflection rate of 6%, which means $GDT
token holders receive a 6% reflection from each transaction processed on the blockchain. This can
amount to massive gains for investors who hold their $GDT tokens for longer periods of time. The
company’s plans to utilize a profit-sharing system on their platforms is in addition to the already existing
6% reflection rate distributed to $GDT holders. Gorilla Diamond Inc. will begin development of the DSM
project during Q3 of 2021, with plans to launch the platform to the public by Q4 of 2021.

As Gorilla Diamond Inc. continues to expand, they have secured deals with additional exchanges, which
rank in the Top 25 worldwide. The company will be collaborating with some very large names in Canada
very soon and will be releasing these announcements on their website. $GDT is expected to grow, with
increasing transactions by the hour. With the development of the DSM, and the implementation of a
profit-sharing model, the company expects exponential growth in the upcoming months. Nevertheless,
there is still time for investors to purchase their $GDT and watch their money grow.
